name: Calculus 1 in This Free 12-Hour Course
title: Calculus 1 in This Free 12-Hour Course
description: Learn Calculus 1 in this full college course by Dr. Linda Green from the University of North Carolina, available on the freeCodeCamp.org YouTube channel. A perfect resource for mastering the fundamentals of calculus.

name: Calculus 2 in This Free 12-Hour Course
title: Calculus 2 in This Free 12-Hour Course
description: Learn Calculus 2 in this full college course by Dr. Linda Green from the University of North Carolina, available on the freeCodeCamp.org YouTube channel

name: Calculus for Data Science & Machine Learning
title: Calculus for Data Science & Machine Learning
description: Learn calculus for data science and machine learning with Lazy Programmer Inc. on Udemy, designed to enhance your AI and deep learning skills through Python programming.

name: Calculus for Machine Learning and Data Science
title: Calculus for Machine Learning and Data Science
description: Calculus for Machine Learning and Data Science  by Luis Serrano is part of the Mathematics for Machine Learning and Data Science Specialization on Class Central.

name: Essence of calculus
title: Essence of calculus
description: Essence of Calculus by 3Blue1Brown on YouTube presents the core concepts of calculus through a visuals-first approach, making complex ideas intuitive and discoverable.

name: Calculus Gradient Descent
title: Calculus Gradient Descent
description: Explore Calculus Gradient Descent on Khan Academy to understand this essential optimization method in calculus, widely used in machine learning and data science applications.

name: Calculus  Partial Derivatives
title: Calculus  Partial Derivatives
description: Learn Calculus Partial Derivatives on Khan Academy to grasp this crucial concept for multivariable functions, widely applied in machine learning and physics.

name: Calculus  Integarls
title: Calculus  Integarls
description: Explore Calculus Integrals on Khan Academy to understand fundamental integration concepts essential for advanced mathematical applications in data science and physics.

name: Calculus Chain Rule
title: Calculus Chain Rule
description: Master the Calculus Chain Rule  on Khan Academy to understand how to differentiate composite functions, a vital tool in calculus and machine learning.

name: Calculus Differential Equations
title: Calculus Differential Equations
description: Learn Differential Equations on Khan Academy to solve real-world problems involving rates of change, a fundamental concept in advanced calculus and physics.

name: Calculus Limits
title: Calculus Limits
description: Explore *Limits* on Khan Academy to understand foundational calculus concepts for analyzing behavior of functions as inputs approach certain values.
